statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
SELECT product_name, max_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > max_stock_threshold;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, max_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > max_stock_threshold ORDER BY max_stock_threshold DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY product_id
SELECT product_name, max_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < max_stock_threshold AND current_stock > min_stock_threshold ORDER BY current_stock DESC

SELECT product_name, current_stock, min_stock_threshold, max_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold OR current_stock > max_stock_threshold ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Items;
SELECT item_id, item_name, stock_quantity FROM Inventory_Items ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM Inventory_Items WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT item_name, last_updated FROM Inventory_Items WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_id, item_name, stock_quantity FROM Inventory_Items WHERE item_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory_Items ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM Inventory_Items WHERE stock_quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, last_updated FROM Inventory_Items WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT i.item_name, s.stockout_date, s.reason FROM Inventory_Items i JOIN Stockout_Log s ON i.item_id = s.item_id WHERE s.stockout_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY s.stockout_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM Stockout_Log GROUP BY item_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY occurrences DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM locations WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT product_name, location_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = inventory.location_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_id

SELECT product_id, product_name, location_name, quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id INNER JOIN locations l ON i.location_id = l.location_id WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY product_id

SELECT p.product_name, l.location_name, i.quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id INNER JOIN locations l ON i.location_id = l.location_id WHERE i.quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name, location_name

SELECT p.product_name, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Products INNER JOIN StockStatus ON Products.product_id = StockStatus.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 100;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, order_quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_quantity DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, last_updated FROM Products INNER JOIN StockLevels ON Products.product_id = StockLevels.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock, last_updated FROM StockLevels WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, stockout_date, stockout_reason FROM StockoutHistory WHERE stockout_reason LIKE '%damage%' ORDER BY stockout_date ASC;
